body:
I honestly have no clue if this is allowed or not, but this song is very motivational, and I wanted to share it with all of you guys. :) 
Before you click the video, please watch the beginning as well, don't just skip to the song. :)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=77PpyAPMU0E
Please send any other motivational songs below! :D I love hearing new songs, and I know a lot of other people do too! :D

title: Dreams - Rylan Wheeler
